document_data.name: Wizard's Quaff
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 24: An Inn For Adventurers}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|29}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Wizard's Quaff''' was an [[ale]] brewed in [[Voonlar]] specifically for the [[Whistling Wizard]] inn ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 25: A Tour of the Wizard}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|30}}
document_data.Description: More accurately described as a small beer, the Wizard's Quaff was a locally brewed, low-quality drink. Its only redeeming feature was that it was free to those staying in the inn. The price for non-paying guests was likely a copper or two, but few willingly chose to have another round if they could afford better.
